entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
